name: v2.9.1
body:
Many companies are successfully building with rules_js.
If you're getting value from the project, please let us know!
Just comment on our [Adoption Discussion](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/discussions/1000).

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_js", version = "2.9.1")

####### Node.js version #########
# By default you get the node version from DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION in @rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl
# Optionally you can pin a different node version:
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.3.0")
node = use_extension("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:extensions.bzl", "node", dev_dependency = True)
node.toolchain(node_version = "18.14.2")
#################################

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")

pnpm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "pnpm")

# Allows developers to use the matching pnpm version, for example:
# bazel run -- @pnpm --dir /home/runner/work/rules_js/rules_js install
use_repo(pnpm, "pnpm")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_js",
    sha256 = "b87afa2205b6fa4540e01d2c47b02a92ed67e24e24f738d46c4c8099836a769a",
    strip_prefix = "rules_js-2.9.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/download/v2.9.1/rules_js-v2.9.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")

rules_js_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:toolchains.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "rules_js_register_toolchains")

rules_js_register_toolchains(node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update Next.js version to 15.2.6 by @scottshuffler in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2591
* Fix fetching npm packages from git repositories by @thomasdraebing in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2403
* fix: do not serialize Label() via "".join() when tar command fails by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2593
* chore: add github_user_id to bcr metadata.template.json by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2588
* fix(pnpm): Parse integrity hash from package.json packageManager if provided by @Geethree in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2596
* fix: npm deps on git+https urls by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2592
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v6 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2523
* chore(deps): update peter-evans/create-pull-request action to v8 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2572
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v1.1.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2599
* test: move babel test deps into test/node-patches/package.json by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2598
* chore(deps): update actions/cache action to v5 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2602

## New Contributors
* @scottshuffler made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2591
* @thomasdraebing made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2403
* @Geethree made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2596

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/compare/v2.9.0...v2.9.1

If you're getting value from the project, please let us know!
Just comment on our [Adoption Discussion](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/discussions/1000).

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_js", version = "2.3.8")

####### Node.js version #########
# By default you get the node version from DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION in @rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl
# Optionally you can pin a different node version:
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.3.0")
node = use_extension("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:extensions.bzl", "node", dev_dependency = True)
node.toolchain(node_version = "16.14.2")
#################################

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")

pnpm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "pnpm")

# Allows developers to use the matching pnpm version, for example:
# bazel run -- @pnpm --dir /home/runner/work/rules_js/rules_js install
use_repo(pnpm, "pnpm")
```

```starlark
    name = "npm",

)

```

* fix(publish): pick up secret when passed from caller workflow by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2201
* refactor: create /ref and /pkg targets for local package store entries by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2191
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v0.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2204
* fix: add live reload tag for ibazel by @Aghassi in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2205
* test: move pnpm_lockfiles/cases to isolated test directories by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2208
* fix: pnpm v9 url version specifiers without resolved semver by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2209
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2203
* test: remove invalid pnpm lockfile test data by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2213

* test: separate optional + lifecycle lockfile test packages by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/2207
